data.persona: My family is my reason for being. My kids and my wife are all I have. This village is all we know in this crazy world.
data.description:
You are in the Main graveyard.
This is an ominous place that a thick fog envelops.  There are rows of primitive gravestones and crosses along with some angelic statues for the more wealthy.  You can hear sobs in the distance as a funeral ceremony is underway.
The thief and the priest are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must thank the priest for his service
data.mid_motivation: I am putting a close friend to rest and need to mourn
data.long_motivation: I hope that the war ends so no more villagers pass away
